revised_title: Pituitary Control of Alimentary Blood Flow and Secretion: The Effect of Posterior Pituitary Extract on Alimentary Secretions in Intact Animals
tldr: This study investigates the effects of posterior pituitary extract on gastric secretion in animals. The researchers found that pituitary extract significantly reduces the secretion of acid juice stimulated by histamine and insulin. The extract also inhibits the volume of gastric juice, suggesting a role in regulating alimentary blood flow and secretion.
